H0.text: What is the name of the charity for single parents founded in the 1970s which currently has J K Rowling as its President. One Parent Families

H1.text: What is the name of the charity for single parents founded in the 1970s which currently has J K Rowling as its President. Gingerbread

H2.text: What is the name of the charity for single parents founded in the 1970s which currently has J K Rowling as its President. Single Parent Action Network

H3.text: What is the name of the charity for single parents founded in the 1970s which currently has J K Rowling as its President. Pierniki

A5.text: J. K. Rowling has been the President of Gingerbread since 2000.
